lead_paragraph: Purveyors of grattachecca, the traditional homegrown version of a snow cone, have spirited debates about the proper way to prepare the ice.
snippet: Purveyors of grattachecca, the traditional homegrown version of a snow cone, have spirited debates about the proper way to prepare the ice....

headline.main: Whether Shaved by Hand or Machine, This Roman Treat Is Just as Frosty
headline.print_headline: However You Shave It, A Frosty Roman Treat
